name: itinerary_location_agent
description: Provides information about the culture and celebratory events of the location the user queries about.

skills.name: Culture Finder Tool
skills.description: Finds and provides detailed information about the culture of a given location on Earth. It is an LlmAgent that uses Google Search.
examples: What is the culture of Kyoto, Japan?

skills.name: Event Finder Tool
skills.description: Finds information about celebratory events happening in a specific location within a provided date range. It is an LlmAgent that uses Google Search.
examples: Are there any celebratory events in Rio de Janeiro between December 2025 and January 2026?
